amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part A in House Report 115-711 to expedite the Army Corps of Engineers reformulation project in certain Sandy Superstorm affected areas of Queens, NY.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Meeks.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
